Uses of Package
com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions

  • Packages that use com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions 
    Package Description
    com.flexisaf.ses.services  
    com.flexisaf.ses.student.handlers  
    com.flexisaf.ses.user.handlers  
    com.flexisaf.ses.utils  
  • Classes in com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions used by com.flexisaf.ses.services 
    Class and Description
    AgeOutOfBoundsException
    To be thrown when the specified age false outside the required boundaries.
    DateFormatException
    To be thrown when a date string doesn't match the preferred format for parsing.
    UnknownUserException
    To be thrown when the specified user account passed along with a client request doesn't exist in the system.
    UnspecifiedDateException
    To be thrown when a required date field is null or empty.
  • Classes in com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions used by com.flexisaf.ses.student.handlers 
    Class and Description
    AgeOutOfBoundsException
    To be thrown when the specified age false outside the required boundaries.
    DateFormatException
    To be thrown when a date string doesn't match the preferred format for parsing.
    DepartmentAlreadyExistsException
    To be thrown when one attempts to create a department whose name matches an already existing department.
    EmailAddressInvalidException
    To be thrown when an email address doesn't match the acceptable format.
    InvalidGenderTypeException
    To be thrown when the gender type value is either unspecified or doesn't match the defined values.
    MissingDepartmentException
    To be thrown when a student object sent over the wire doesn't include a department ID.
    UnknownUserException
    To be thrown when the specified user account passed along with a client request doesn't exist in the system.
    UnspecifiedDateException
    To be thrown when a required date field is null or empty.
    UserAccountNotSpecifiedException
    To be thrown when a client request doesn't have a user account.
  • Classes in com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions used by com.flexisaf.ses.user.handlers 
    Class and Description
    UnknownUserException
    To be thrown when the specified user account passed along with a client request doesn't exist in the system.
    UserAccountNotSpecifiedException
    To be thrown when a client request doesn't have a user account.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    This is thrown when a client request attempts to create a user whose user name matches that of an existing user.
  • Classes in com.flexisaf.ses.exceptions used by com.flexisaf.ses.utils 
    Class and Description
    DateFormatException
    To be thrown when a date string doesn't match the preferred format for parsing.
    UnspecifiedDateException
    To be thrown when a required date field is null or empty.
